name: Atla
tagline: Automatically detect errors in your AI agents
description: Atla is the only eval tool that helps you automatically discover the underlying issues in your AI agents. Understand step-level errors, prioritize recurring failure patterns, and fix issues fast–before your users ever notice.

name: Subscription Day
tagline: Track your paid subscriptions in one place
description: Subscription Day is a small but so useful Menu Bar app to keep track of your paid subscriptions and analyze spending statistics.

name: SalesTarget.ai
tagline: Automate B2B outreach with your AI sales Co-Pilot
description: SalesTarget.ai is an all-in-one platform for B2B sales teams. Find leads, launch AI powered cold email campaigns, and manage your pipeline from one place. The Campaign Copilot handles targeting, scheduling, and follow ups automatically.

name: HyNote for Apple Watch
tagline: Live Recording with Apple Watch
description: HyNote for Apple Watch is your fastest way to capture thoughts on the go. Just tap your wrist to record—everything syncs to HyNote, where AI transcribes, summarizes, and turns recordings into actionable notes.

name: Monologue
tagline: Effortless voice dictation so you can work 3x faster
description: Voice dictation that speaks your language. Stay in flow. Speak naturally. Monologue understands your context, learns your vocabulary, and formats automatically—so you can write what you meant to say.

name: Gamma API
tagline: Auto-generate decks, docs & social posts inside any workflow
description: Bring the power of Gamma’s AI into your tools. Instantly turn text, data, or transcripts into beautiful presentations, reports, and carousels all through our API.

name: Basedash Agent
tagline: Your AI Data Analyst
description: Answer questions, create visualizations, and surface insights on all your company's data. Unlock the power of a data analyst with the ease of ChatGPT.

name: Lookup
tagline: Ask Video Anything
description: Lookup turns raw footage into structured answers, proof clips, and automations with just a few lines of code. From counting people to compliance checks, it makes video searchable and programmable—this will help any app see.

name: Brex 1-Click Accounting by Puzzle's API
tagline: The fastest way to do accounting
description: With Puzzle’s Developer API, setting up your startup’s accounting now takes just one click inside Brex. Startups can get an end-to-end accounting system up and running in no time—saving time, centralizing financials, and becoming tax- and fundraise-ready.

name: SEO EEAT Check
tagline: Check what Google thinks of your content
description: Get instant E-E-A-T scores and AI-powered recommendations to improve your content's trustworthiness and search rankings.

name: Vibe n8n
tagline: Cursor/Lovable for n8n to generate workflows in seconds
description: Vibe n8n is an AI assistant that generates, improves, and debugs complete n8n automations directly inside your editor. Works with n8n.io, n8n.cloud, and self-hosted.

name: Jotform WordPress Agent
tagline: AI chatbot for every WordPress site
description: WordPress Agent adds an AI chatbot to your site in minutes. It answers FAQs, guides visitors, boosts form completions, and supports WooCommerce. Everything syncs with Jotform, you can track chats, leads, and actions in one platform, without any coding.

name: Alice 4.0
tagline: AI productivity layer for your OS
description: Alice is a desktop app for macOS, Windows & Linux that lets you chat with leading AI models, deploy Assistants and chat to your apps MCP and automations. Version 4.0 marks the biggest leap in our 4 year productivity journey.

name: DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus
tagline: A refined agentic model for developers
description: DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus is the latest update to the DeepSeek-V3.1 model. This "Terminus" version focuses on stability and refinement, fixing issues like language mixing and improving agent capabilities, while retaining the core strengths of the V3.1 series.

name: Onyx
tagline: The open source AI teammate you've dreamed of
description: AI for real work, not just chat. Connect any LLM to your team's data. Build AI agents with actions & MCP. Search internal docs & the web. Deep research everything. All private and open source.

name: ToolJet
tagline: AI agents that build full-stack internal tools for you.
description: Build production-ready full-stack applications with AI agents that turn text into apps - UI, queries, workflows, and more. Secure, scalable, and flexible: AI when it works, no-code when you want, low-code when you need. 36k stars on GiHub.

name: Qwen3-Omni
tagline: Native end-to-end multilingual omni-modal LLM
description: Qwen3-omni is a natively end-to-end, omni-modal LLM developed by the Qwen team at Alibaba Cloud, capable of understanding text, audio, images, and video, as well as generating speech in real time.

name: Simple Commenter
tagline: Website feedback tool your clients will actually use.
description: Simple Commenter is a lightweight, visual feedback tool your clients will actually use without a single complaint. It masterfully balances powerful features for developers and agencies with a user experience so simple that it’s virtually foolproof for clients.

name: Hyperif
tagline: One interface. All your tools. No MCPs, no code, no servers.
description: Hyperif is your AI assistant that connects to all your apps and lets you analyze, summarize, and act on data — from one interface. No MCPs. No coding. No servers. Just connect and go. [EARLY PREVIEW]

name: ShareBox
tagline: Effortless secure file sharing
description: With this new ShareBox update, managing your files has never been easier. Just drag & drop to upload directly to Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox or iCloud. Or securely share your work with clients. Fast, private, and effortless. File Sharing, Unboxed!

name: Atla
tagline: Automatically detect errors in your AI agents
description: Atla is the only eval tool that helps you automatically discover the underlying issues in your AI agents. Understand step-level errors, prioritize recurring failure patterns, and fix issues fast–before your users ever notice.
